TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlEntity extends System.Xml.XmlNode

span.span: Represents an entity declaration, such as <!ENTITY... >.
XML Document Object Model (DOM)

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property BaseURI As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ BaseURI { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取当前节点的基础统一资源标识符 (URI)。

span.span: Gets the base Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the current node.
The location from which the node was loaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 联网的 XML 文档的聚合使用各种 World Wide Web 联合会 (W3C) 标准包含机制的数据块组成，因此包含来自不同位置的节点。A networked XML document is comprised of chunks of data aggregated using various World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) standard inclusion mechanisms and therefore contains nodes that come from different places. `BaseURI`告诉您这些节点来自何处。The `BaseURI` tells you where these nodes came from. 此属性的值取决于节点类型。The value of this property varies depending on the node type. 这是外部的 EntityReference 节点的子级的节点返回实体本身的位置。Nodes which are children of external EntityReference nodes return the location of the entity itself. 例如，考虑下面的 XML 文档：For example, consider the following XML document: ```xml ]> &xyz; ``` 其中的外部实体`a/b.xml`包含的 XML 文本`123`。where the external entity `a/b.xml` contains the XML text `123`. 如果从加载该文档http://server/mydata.xml，`BaseURI`返回以下：If the document is loaded from http://server/mydata.xml, `BaseURI` returns the following: |NodeTypeNodeType|nameName|BaseURIBaseURI| |--------------|----------|-------------| |特性Attribute|numnum|http://server/mydata.xml| |DocumentDocument|#document#document|http://server/mydata.xml| |DocumentTypeDocumentType|项item|http://server/mydata.xml| |实体Entity|xyzxyz|http://server/mydata.xml| |元素Element|项item|http://server/mydata.xml| |EntityReferenceEntityReference|xyzxyz|http://server/mydata.xml| |元素Element|测试test|http://server/a/b.xml| |TextText|#text#text|http://server/a/b.xml| `BaseURI` 查找实体引用边界，因此，如果实体被展开，此信息不会保留此属性返回的位置`XmlDocument`在所有情况下的对象。`BaseURI` looks for entity reference boundaries, so if entities are expanded, this information is not preserved and this property returns the location of the `XmlDocument` object in all cases. 作为第二个示例中，给定以下 XML 文档：As a second example, given the following XML document: ```xml &xyz; ``` 其中的文档类型定义 (DTD) 文件包含如下内容：where the document type definition (DTD) file contains the following: ``` My Data"> ``` 如果 XML 文档加载从http://localhost/mydata.xml，`BaseURI`返回以下内容，每个节点：If the XML document is loaded from http://localhost/mydata.xml, `BaseURI` returns the following for each of the nodes: |NodeTypeNodeType|nameName|BaseURIBaseURI| |--------------|----------|-------------| |DocumentDocument|#document#document|http://localhost/mydata.xml| |DocumentTypeDocumentType|MydataMydata|http://localhost/doctype.dtd| |元素Element|baa，这是baa|http://localhost/mydata.xml| |实体Entity|xyzxyz|http://localhost/doctype.dtd| |EntityReferenceEntityReference|xyzxyz|http://localhost/mydata.xml| |特性Attribute|woofwoof|http://localhost/mydata.xml| > [!NOTE] > 默认属性的基本 URI 是元素的其所属的基 URI 相同。The base URI of a default attribute is the same as the base URI of the element to which they belong. 此属性是文档对象模型 (DOM) 的 Microsoft 扩展。This property is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).

Creates a duplicate of this node.

span.span: Entity nodes cannot be cloned.

summary.span: 获取实体节点和所有其子级的串联值。

span.span: Gets the concatenated values of the entity node and all its children.

span.span: The concatenated values of the node and all its children.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `XmlEntity` 节点是只读的。`XmlEntity` nodes are read-only. 设置此属性将引发异常。Setting this property throws an exception. 此属性是文档对象模型 (DOM) 的 Microsoft 扩展。This property is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).

span.span: Attempting to set the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `XmlEntity` 节点是只读的。`XmlEntity` nodes are read-only. 设置此属性将引发异常。Setting this property throws an exception. 此属性是文档对象模型 (DOM) 的 Microsoft 扩展。This property is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).

summary.span: 获取指示节点是否只读的值。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the node is read-only.

value.span: 如果节点是只读的，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the node is read-only; otherwise .

value.span: 由于 节点为只读，该属性总是返回 。

span.span: Because nodes are read-only, this property always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只读节点是一个不能更改其属性、 特性或子级。A read-only node is one whose properties, attributes, or children cannot be changed. 可以从树中删除只读节点并插入其他位置。You can remove a read-only node from the tree and insert it somewhere else.
